task_summary: Robot arm pours contents from a held container into a mug, ensuring robust perception and goal alignment, followed by measured pouring and task completion retreat.

task_long_description.overview: The episode features a robotic arm, SARA, tasked with pouring a liquid (or simulated contents) from a held container into a mug placed on a workbench. The BT begins by ensuring that the mug is reliably detected in the workspace using fallback perception. The arm then moves above the mug, aligning the container for a controlled pour action, tilting the container to a defined angle until the mug is full. Lastly, the arm retreats from the mug to signal task completion. Key roles include perception, precise alignment, pouring with correct tilt and rate, and safe withdrawal.
preconditions: Mug is present and reachable on the workspace.
No obstructions between robot and mug.
stepwise_plan: Check mug visibility; detect as needed.
Move to a safe offset above the mug.
Pour contents from the container into mug (full, at 90Â° tilt).
success_criteria: Robot ends in a safe pose, clear of the mug.
failure_and_recovery: Pour incomplete: reattempt pour if possible.
Collision or pour spillage: abort and retract arm.
task_long_description.termination: Task concludes when mug is filled and robot has retreated safely.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the mug is visible in the workspace.
Detects the mug in the workspace with a timeout.
Moves robot arm to a position above the mug with a safe vertical offset.
Pours contents from the held container into the mug at a 90-degree tilt until full.
Retreats arm from the mug area to complete the task.

recovery_strategy: Abort and retract arm on pour or collision failure.
assumptions: Held container is pre-grasped by robot at episode start, inferred from initial frames.
Pour angle and rate selected from visible episode cues (full tilting, normal speed).
Instruction lacks source object detail; mapped to held_container by observation.
No explicit force/tolerance values in instruction or frames, set as null.
Amount set as 'full', based on visible mug filling sequence.
No evidence of retry or precise tolerance requirement in frames or instruction; BT reflects this.

expected_success_criteria: Robot arm retracts clear of mug.
